title: Neogothic
description: In Neogothic, a Fantasy novella, Rob, a recovering addict turned counselor falls--yet again--into shadow as New York's underworld surfaces at the nexus of three planes of existence, and a DemonLord is pitted against an alliance of humans and Belladoran races--fairies, elves, halflings, dwarves and dragons--in possession of a powerful malevolent relic; and they bet their lives the horrendous maw of malice will self-devour.
author: Anthony Jerome Brown
